participant_1.background:
I like watching sports.
I work out daily.
Ferrari is my favorite car company.
Basketball is my favorite sport to watch.

participant_2.background:
I am a yoga instructor.
I am very health conscious , and i watch what i eat.
I love romantic comedies.
I like to write poetry in my spare time.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I like to write poetry in my spare time.
That's cool! I've always wanted to try writing poetry, but I'm not very good at it.
It's all about practice! I'm sure you'd be great at it if you gave it a try.
Maybe I will. What kind of poetry do you write?
I write a lot of different kinds of poetry, but I mostly write about love and relationships.
That sounds really interesting. I'd love to read some of your work sometime.
Sure, I'd be happy to share it with you.
What do you like to do for fun?
I'm a yoga instructor, so I love practicing yoga and teaching it to others. I'm also really health conscious, so I watch what I eat and try to stay active.
That sounds great! I'm not very active, but I'm trying to be more.
That's good to hear! I'm sure you'll be able to reach your fitness goals if you keep at it.
Thanks for the encouragement!
You're welcome!
I'm also a big fan of basketball. I love watching and playing the game.
That's awesome! I'm not much of a sports fan, but I can appreciate a good basketball game.
Have you ever been to a basketball game?
No, I've never been to a live basketball game.
You should go sometime! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will. Thanks for the recommendation.
